field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Sets the Size of the Slider Images. Padding, shadows etc will added from this size.

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Sets the Size of the Slider Images. Padding, shadows etc will added from this size.

field.name: theme
field.label: Theme
field.description: Slider theme - Light, Dark

field.name: shadow
field.label: Shadow
field.description: Activate Shadow True/False

field.name: thumbStyle
field.label: Thumb Style
field.description: Thumbnail style - Bullet, Thumb or None

field.name: timer
field.label: Timer
field.description: Global setting to swap between the banner items, in seconds.

field.name: showtimer
field.label: Show Timer
field.description: Show the timer html element on the slider

field.name: touchenabled
field.label: Touch Enabled
field.description: Enable the touch swipe detection on/off

field.name: global_effect_type
field.label: Default Color Effect
field.description: The default color transition effect. Will be set to all slides by default.

field.name: position
field.label: Position on the page
field.description: The position of the slider on the page, (float:left, float:right, margin:0px auto;)

field.name: margin_top
field.label: Margin Top
field.description: The top margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_bottom
field.label: Margin Bottom
field.description: The bottom margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_left
field.label: Margin Left
field.description: The left margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: margin_right
field.label: Margin Right
field.description: The right margin of the slider wrapper div

field.name: thumbWidth
field.label: Thumb Width
field.description: Width of the Preview Thumbnails

field.name: thumbHeight
field.label: Thumb Height
field.description: Height of the Preview Thumbnails

field.name: thumbAmount
field.label: Amount of Thumbs
field.description: How many Thumbs visible?

field.name: thumbSpaces
field.label: Space Between Thumbs
field.description: Space between Thumbs

field.name: thumbPadding
field.label: Thumb Inner Padding
field.description: Inner Padding of the Thumbs

field.name: thumbVideoIcon
field.label: Thumb Video Icon
field.description: On / Off (Show or not the small Video Icon on the Thumbs

field.name: bulletXOffset
field.label: Bullet X Offset
field.description: Bullet Position offset from Center Bottom

field.name: bulletYOffset
field.label: Bullet Y Offset
field.description: Bullet Position offset from Center Bottom

field.name: pauseOnRollOverThumbs
field.label: Pause On Thumbs Rollover
field.description: Stop the Ken Burn Animation and Countdown when mouse is over the thumbs (On/Off)

field.name: pauseOnRollOverMain
field.label: Pause On Main Rollover
field.description: Stop the Ken Burn Animation and Countdown when mouse is over the main image (On/Off)

field.name: preloadedSlides
field.label: Preload Slides
field.description: Amount of slides should be preloaded before slider start

field.name: useGoogleFonts
field.label: Use Google Fonts
field.description: Include google fonts - yes / no.

field.name: googleFontOrigin
field.label: Google Fonts JS
field.description: From where the google font js goes. Choose 'Local' if you don't have outside internet.

field.name: googleFonts
field.label: Google Font
field.description: The Google Font you want tlo load. i.e. 'PT+Sans+Narrow:400,700' If you leave it empty '' no Google Font will be loaded

field.name: debug
field.label: Debug
field.description: Shows some Loading Debug Information to help understand why Slider loading time too long

field.name: jquery_noconflict
field.label: JQuery No Conflict Mode
field.description: Turns on / off jquery noconflict mode. You can play with this option when you have some javascript conflicts.

field.name: js_to_body
field.label: Put JS Includes To Body
field.description: Putting the js to body (in addition to head) is good for fixing some javascript conflicts of type: TypeError: tpj('#rev_slider_1_1').show().revolution is not a function

field.name: output_type
field.label: Output Filters Protection
field.description: Activate a protection against wordpress output filters that adds html blocks to the shortcode output like P and BR
